name: Clopidogrel bisulfate
indications: clopidogrel p2y 12 platelet inhibitor indicated : acute coronary syndrome patients non–st-segment elevation acs ( unstable angina [ ua ] /non-st-elevation myocardial infarction [ nstemi ] ) , clopidogrel shown reduce rate myocardial infarction ( myocardial infarction ) stroke . ( 1.1 ) patients st-elevation myocardial infarction ( stemi ) , clopidogrel shown reduce rate myocardial infarction stroke . ( 1.1 ) recent myocardial infarction , recent stroke , established peripheral arterial disease . clopidogrel shown reduce rate myocardial infarction stroke . ( 1.2 )
contraindications: acute coronary syndrome ( 2.1 ) initiate clopidogrel single 300-mg oral loading dose continue 75 mg daily . initiate clopidogrel without loading dose delay establishment antiplatelet effect several days . recent myocardial infarction , recent stroke , established peripheral arterial disease : 75 mg daily orally without loading dose ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions: clopidogrel tablets , usp 75 mg available pink colored , round shaped , biconvex , film coated tablets de-bossed one side sg 124 side . tablets provided follows : ndc : 70518-4110-00 ndc : 70518-4110-01 ndc : 70518-4110-02 ndc : 70518-4110-03 ndc : 70518-4110-04 packaging : 90 1 bottle plastic packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 90 1 bottle plastic packaging : 30 1 bottle plastic store 25° c ( 77° f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30° c ( 59° 86° f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions: active pathological bleeding , peptic ulcer intracranial hemorrhage ( 4.1 ) hypersensitivity clopidogrel component product ( 4.2 )
indications_original: Clopidogrel is a P2Y 12 platelet inhibitor indicated for: Acute coronary syndrome For patients with non–ST-segment elevation ACS (unstable angina [UA]/non-ST-elevation myocardial infarction [NSTEMI]), clopidogrel has been shown to reduce the rate of myocardial infarction (MI) and stroke. ( 1.1 ) For patients with ST-elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI), clopidogrel has been shown to reduce the rate of MI and stroke. ( 1.1 ) Recent MI, recent stroke, or established peripheral arterial disease. Clopidogrel has been shown to reduce the rate of MI and stroke. ( 1.2 )
contraindications_original: Acute coronary syndrome ( 2.1 ) Initiate clopidogrel with a single 300-mg oral loading dose and then continue at 75 mg once daily. Initiate clopidogrel without a loading dose will delay establishment of an antiplatelet effect by several days. Recent MI, recent stroke, or established peripheral arterial disease: 75 mg once daily orally without a loading dose ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Clopidogrel tablets, USP 75 mg are available as pink colored, round shaped, biconvex, film coated tablets de-bossed on one side with SG and 124 on other side. Tablets are provided as follows:
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  NDC: 70518-4110-00
                  NDC: 70518-4110-01
                  NDC: 70518-4110-02
                  NDC: 70518-4110-03
                  NDC: 70518-4110-04
                  PACKAGING: 90 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 90 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC 
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  Store at 25° C (77° F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30° C (59° to 86° F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions_original: Active pathological bleeding, such as peptic ulcer or intracranial hemorrhage ( 4.1 ) Hypersensitivity to clopidogrel or any component of the product ( 4.2 )
